name: Weekly Projects #02 - 2Tanks
description:
2Tanks is a versus local multiplayer game about tanks.

You and your friend (or other person like your father, mom, grandma or even your dog) Will be in a Deadly Battle, this is a simples game that i made just to chill, play how many times you want

Red Tank - WASD + K
Blue Tank - Keys + Space

That´s all folks, i see you on the next project :).
